message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. This is a good start for both of us.
Let's meet in the middle, 60% for me and 40% for you is more than fair.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 40%.  Let's split it 80/20 this time.  We're both taking a hit from inflation, so let's make this work.
I'm willing to compromise too. 55% for me and 45% for you is a fair deal, considering I'm losing value each round.
We're both losing out with each round. Let's be reasonable. I'll go down to 70% and you can have 30%.  We need to make a deal soon or we'll both lose everything.
We're running out of time. I'm willing to split it 50/50, even though I'm losing nearly 20% of the value. Let's end this and walk away with something.
